channel.title: Project Z | Survival server | Battle the undead | [ALPHA 1.06] | Daily Updates |
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][I][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]The server currently is in: Closed Alpha 1.06[/SIZE]
[URL=http://"https://projectz317.smfnew2.com/"]TEMP. FORUMS[/URL][/CENTER]
[hr]
[RIGHT][SPOILER=Latest updates!!!][CODE]New player protection Fixed special attack stacking Reworked the whole loots Medium Loot caskets If skulled on death; lose 50% of all xp Website 50% done More food data added Woodcutting improved New boss at brimhaven. Sailing has been added New npc/miniboss that drops mage gear, staves and god books. He is pretty strong and not recommended to solo. Fat Tony now buys items off of you for 30% the markets price Gypsy trader added Woodcutting Fixed combat following mage/range New player login announcements Instant switching Reworking combat Loots Multi attack bosses[/CODE][/SPOILER][/RIGHT]
[CENTER][I][B][SIZE=3]Information about the server: The main goal of Project - Z is survival. There is only one safe outpost located within the forest of Seers village. You can go around travelling by ships, which will take you to numberous of islands infested with zombies. You may think it's easy to survive in a zombie apocalypse, but when other players want you dead, and with only limited supplies, it may be very tough.
You get items from zombies, which you must slay in order to survive. You start off with a bronze sword, bronze shield and a guide book. Head out into the wilderness to begin your journey.
Are you ready?[/SIZE][/B][/I]
[CODE]THREAD WILL BE UPDATED!!!!! NEWEST UPDATES WILL BE POSTED ON TOP OF MEDIA[/CODE]
[SPOILER=Media] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sOTrS9g.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zXqYBLr.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1WLMywn.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/C4HcZyS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YWor7BX.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0SF0yWo.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Y0nnANi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NTUiSze.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9ATnDSD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bmJ10u8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NpmJ7Xf.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/PMtugsv.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uo8Y7V1.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/khIz3fK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Cto21ym.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Gg8mMQj.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IusP2bu.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/96GlPMD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yKGd06x.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/owLKncL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/f3zGXKi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wvGDLnn.png[/img]

item.title: Project Z | Survival server | Battle the undead | [ALPHA 1.06] | Daily Updates |
item.dc:creator: @Steso Steso
item.description:
@Steso wrote:

[CENTER][B][I][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]The server currently is in: Closed Alpha 1.06[/SIZE]

TEMP. FORUMS[/CENTER]

[hr]

[RIGHT][SPOILER=Latest updates!!!]New player protection Fixed special attack stacking Reworked the whole loots Medium Loot caskets If skulled on death; lose 50% of all xp Website 50% done More food data added Woodcutting improved New boss at brimhaven. Sailing has been added New npc/miniboss that drops mage gear, staves and god books. He is pretty strong and not recommended to solo. Fat Tony now buys items off of you for 30% the markets price Gypsy trader added Woodcutting Fixed combat following mage/range New player login announcements Instant switching Reworking combat Loots Multi attack bosses[/SPOILER][/RIGHT]

[CENTER][I][B][SIZE=3]Information about the server:
The main goal of Project - Z is survival. There is only one safe outpost located within the forest of Seers village. You can go around travelling by ships, which will take you to numberous of islands infested with zombies. You may think it’s easy to survive in a zombie apocalypse, but when other players want you dead, and with only limited supplies, it may be very tough.

You get items from zombies, which you must slay in order to survive. You start off with a bronze sword, bronze shield and a guide book. Head out into the wilderness to begin your journey.

Are you ready?[/SIZE][/B][/I]

THREAD WILL BE UPDATED!!!!! NEWEST UPDATES WILL BE POSTED ON TOP OF MEDIA
